#summary Instructions for using open-bam-daemon.pl

= Introduction =

open-bam-daemon.pl provides a drop-in replacement for the engine/backend component of the Motorola BAM 2.0 software.

= Prerequisites =
 * Motorola BAM 2.0 server using MySQL as the backend database.
 * [http://fallabs.com/kyotocabinet/ KyotoCabinet] Database library.
